job description:
Location: Corona, CA Job Code: 172770 Posted: Nov 14, 2018 Description:

Mastech Digital provides digital and mainstream technology staff as well as Digital Transformation Services for leading American Corporations. We are currently seeking a Data Analyst for our client in the Healthcare domain. We value our professionals, providing comprehensive benefits, exciting challenges, and the opportunity for growth. This is a Contract position and the client is looking for someone to start immediately.

Duration: 4 Months Contract

Location: Corona, CA

Compensation: Best Market Rate

Role: Data Analyst

Primary Skills: Data Analysis

Role Description: The Data Analyst would need to have at least 3+ years of experience. In this role, you will provide data architectural leadership in developing enterprise data/process models, and logical/physical database designs.

Responsibilities/Experience:
  • Provide data and database development, maintenance, and production support.
  • Participate in IT and Business project to define system requirements.
  • 3-6 years of experience.
  • Business analysis.
  • Business process modeling - enterprise to department level.
  • Ability to interpret Entity Relationship Diagrams.
Education: High School/Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Electrical/Electronic Engineering, Information Technology or another related field or Equivalent

Experience: Minimum 3+ years

Relocation: This position will not cover relocation expenses

Travel: N/A

Local Preferred: Yes

Recruiter Name: Tarun Garg

Recruiter Phone: 877.884.8834 (Ext: 2188)

Equal Employment Opportunity
